METADATA.TITLE: Santeri Ora
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Check Santeri's experience and latest ventures in full-stack development and entrepreneurship.

HOME.HEADING: Welcome to My Portfolio
HOME.INTRO_P1: Hi, I'm Santeri Ora, a Lean-driven full-stack developer and a second-time founder. I specialize in building scalable web applications, combining deep technical expertise with a strong business understanding.
HOME.INTRO_P2: I graduated at the end of 2025 with a Master's degree in Computer Science from Tampere University. Currently, I am focused on scaling my company, Superwider, where I am building a data-driven platform that automates performance-based influencer marketing through social media integrations.
HOME.INTRO_P3: I'm passionate about solving complex technical challenges and turning business needs into efficient software solutions. Let's connect, and don't forget to check out Superwider!

SERVICES.TITLE: Software Services
SERVICES.INTRO: Results-driven and comprehensive development for modern web products. My service is designed to bridge the gap between limited "no-code" setups and expensive, often rigid software agencies. I provide a functional, launch-ready version within 1 to 2 weeks. This is followed by a round of edits based on your feedback and a final polish to ensure a flawless result for the official launch. See below how this fast and expert approach helps your business grow.

SECTION_1.TITLE: Engineering & Software Development
SECTION_1.SUBTITLE: I build unique websites for businesses that demand high-performance, professional digital solutions. These are not generic templates: every site is built to support your brand and sales goals.

BENEFIT_1.TITLE: Peak Performance:
BENEFIT_1.DESCRIPTION: I optimize performance so your customers never have to wait for pages to load.

BENEFIT_2.TITLE: Seamless Mobile Experience:
BENEFIT_2.DESCRIPTION: Your site will work and look great on every screen size from the smallest smartphones to the largest desktops.

BENEFIT_3.TITLE: Scalable Architecture:
BENEFIT_3.DESCRIPTION: The code is built to grow with your business. Adding new features is effortless and free of the technical roadblocks typical of "drag and drop" builders.

BENEFIT_4.TITLE: Search-Optimized Code:
BENEFIT_4.DESCRIPTION: Professional coding standards ensure Google reads your site correctly, which improves your rankings in search results.

SERVICE_1.TITLE: Custom Websites & Apps
SERVICE_1.LEAD: I build solutions from the ground up to ensure your site is optimized to reach more visitors and turn them into paying customers.
SERVICE_1.EXAMPLE: Superwider. A complex web application designed for managing large amounts of data and demanding integrations.

SERVICE_2.TITLE: Website Modernization
SERVICE_2.LEAD: Upgrade your existing site into a powerful tool in half the time.
SERVICE_2.DESCRIPTION: If your current site is slow or outdated, rebuilding it is often more profitable than patching old code. I use your current site as a map, allowing me to deliver a superior, updated version with your desired changes much faster than starting from a blank slate.
SERVICE_2.EXAMPLE: Välitän LKV. An aging legacy website transformed into a modern digital tool for customer acquisition.

SERVICE_1.TITLE: E-commerce Solutions (Shopify)
SERVICE_1.LEAD: Launch a professional online store at a fraction of the cost of custom coding.
SERVICE_1.DESCRIPTION: I use the Shopify platform to provide a secure and easy-to-manage foundation for your store. I handle the creation of the store, the installation of payment methods, and the setup of shipping options. You can focus on selling without worrying about technical details.

BENEFIT_1.TITLE: Cost-Efficient:
BENEFIT_1.DESCRIPTION: Get a high-end store without the massive investment required for custom-built commerce software.

BENEFIT_2.TITLE: Automated Security:
BENEFIT_2.DESCRIPTION: The platform handles security and updates automatically so you can focus on your business.

BENEFIT_3.TITLE: Built for Growth:
BENEFIT_3.DESCRIPTION: The system supports your business from your first order up to tens of thousands of orders per month.

SERVICE_1.EXAMPLE: Pumppi Lab. A simple yet modern shopping experience designed to turn social media traffic into direct revenue.

SERVICE_2.TITLE: Strategic & Technical SEO
SERVICE_2.LEAD: My PRO SEO service is a growth package designed to help you outpace competitors and turn Google searches into actual revenue.

ITEM_1.TITLE: Technical Health Checks:
ITEM_1.DESCRIPTION: I fix the hidden errors that prevent your site from showing up in search results.

ITEM_2.TITLE: Competitor Intelligence:
ITEM_2.DESCRIPTION: I analyze exactly what your competitors are doing and find the keywords your customers are actually using.

ITEM_3.TITLE: Digital Reputation:
ITEM_3.DESCRIPTION: I strengthen your site's authority by securing links from other reputable websites.

ITEM_4.TITLE: Quality Content:
ITEM_4.DESCRIPTION: I handle the production of blog posts and articles to build trust with both search engines and your customers.

ITEM_5.TITLE: Automated Reach:
ITEM_5.DESCRIPTION: I build systems that can create hundreds of targeted pages to capture the most important search terms in your industry.

SERVICE_2.EXAMPLE: Superwider. A platform built for maximum visibility using a professional linking strategy and targeted content.

WHY_ME.TITLE: Why Work With Me
WHY_ME.SUBTITLE: I focus on delivering professional results without unnecessary bureaucracy, delays, or technical limitations.

REASON_1.TITLE: Fast Delivery (2–4 Weeks)
REASON_1.DESCRIPTION: While traditional software agencies often take months to launch a single project, I deliver your first version in 1 to 2 weeks. This draft is fully functional and ready to go live. My iterative development model ensures you see progress in real time and allows us to make adjustments based on real-world use.

REASON_2.TITLE: Engineering Quality vs. Basic Tools
REASON_2.DESCRIPTION: Many providers rely solely on visual no-code tools. While fast to set up, they often result in slow and limited websites. I use the same coding standards as the world's leading tech companies. This ensures your site is faster, more secure, and performs at a level that basic builders cannot reach.

REASON_3.TITLE: Low Maintenance Costs
REASON_3.DESCRIPTION: Poorly built sites lead to expensive technical issues. By building correctly from the start, I ensure your site remains reliable and easy to manage. You skip high monthly fees and complex service integration costs. My maintenance is affordable: averaging only 20€ per month for professional hosting and security updates.

REASON_4.TITLE: Risk-Free 1 Year Warranty
REASON_4.DESCRIPTION: I stand by the quality of my work. If any bugs or issues appear within the first year, I will fix them free of charge. You can trust that your investment is protected by a professional engineer.

VALITAN.TITLE: Välitän LKV
VALITAN.DESCRIPTION: Service website with a focus on clarity and conversions.
